column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////But that's just because Lou's pizza is so popular. And why? Because IT'S THE BEST. The crust is buttery and delicious in every way
column2: the cheese is melted to the perfect level of stringiness
column3: there's just enough of that undeniably savory tomato sauce -- and the sausage is just indescribable. Only Lou does this just right.
